title: REESE'S STUFFED WITH REESE'S PUFFS CEREAL Big Cup Milk Chocolate Peanut Butter, Gluten Free Cups Candy Packs, 1.2 oz (16 Count)
features: Contains sixteen (16) 1.2-ounce packs of REESE'S STUFFED WITH REESE'S PUFFS CEREAL Big Cup Milk Chocolate Peanut Butter Cups Candy in a box
Experience a crunchy, delicious duo of REESE'S milk chocolate peanut butter cups stuffed with REESE'S Puffs Cereal during movie nights, snack breaks, adventures and picnics
Kosher and gluten-free peanut butter cup stuffed with REESE'S Puffs Cereal wrapped to retain freshness
Use REESE'S candy for filling birthday gift bags and back-to-school lunch boxes or bridal and baby shower candy dishes
Enjoy this peanut butter and chocolate candy with whole pieces of cereal inside during your Christmas, Easter, Valentine's Day and Halloween candy celebrations
description: Tasty REESE'S Puffs Cereal stuffed inside REESE'S peanut butter chocolate cups is the ultimate mashup of all things peanut butter and milk chocolate with an extra crunchy bite. REESE'S cereal tastes great with cold milk, but paired with a classic peanut butter cup turns an ordinary chocolate treat into an exciting snack. Take REESE'S STUFFED WITH REESE'S PUFFS CEREAL Big Cup milk chocolate peanut butter cups on your next road trip, hand them out during game night or simply fill your candy bowls and pantry with these creamy yet crunchy peanut butter treats. REESE'S cups are kosher and gluten-free candies that can also help you create new desserts in the kitchen. Try crumbling peanut butter REESE'S cereal cups into cookies and brownies, or freeze these Big Cups to refresh your taste buds. You can even fill Valentine's Day gifts bags, Easter baskets, Halloween candy bowls and Christmas stockings with milk chocolate covered peanut butter and REESE'S Puffs Cereal candies.
